data.name: MAGpy
data.description: Snakemake pipeline for downstream analysis of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) (pronounced mag-pie)

evidence: "MAGpy is a Snakemake pipeline for downstream analysis of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs)" (pipeline used directly for scientific analysis, i.e., an application).
The README describes running it as a workflow: "snakemake -rp -s MAGpy --use-conda --cores 8" (end users execute the pipeline to perform analyses).
Installation and use are via cloning the repository: "git clone https://github.com/WatsonLab/MAGpy.git" followed by Snakemake commands, with no mention of package registries or binaries.
